IWebCamera

Defines the interface to a WebCamera.

Module

import Cameras.WebCamera.IWebCamera;

Functions
GetAvailableDevices
static std::vector<CameraInfo> GetAvailableDevices()

Returns a list of cameras available on the system

Module

import Cameras.WebCamera.IWebCamera;

CreateWebCamera
CRefObj<IWebCamera> CreateWebCamera(
std::wstring deviceName,
int w = -1,
int h = -1,
int frameRate = 30
)

Creates a new instance of WebCamera.

Parameters
deviceName
std::wstring

name of device to create

w
int

required resolution in X

h
int

required resolution in Y

frameRate
int

requested frame rate

Returns

Returns the newly created camera

Module

import Cameras.WebCamera.IWebCamera;
